workTitle: Case studies and client stories from NearForm customers

paragraphs: Get all the latest NearForm news, from technology to design.
© Copyright 2022 NearForm Ltd. All Rights Reserved.
NearForm Ltd. Tankfield, Convent Hill, Tramore, Co. Waterford, X91 PV08, Ireland. Privacy Policy. Cookies Notice.
We design and build future-ready digital products to accelerate transformation and create digital capability.

We believe that great things happen when you get the very best talent working on the toughest problems. Our culture empowers us to produce great work and great outcomes, both professional and personal.

We live this culture every day as a company with over ten years of remote-first operation, sourcing the very best talent from thirty countries and connecting through client projects, open source communities and constant conversation and collaboration.
Every NearFormer is challenged to strive, learn and grow and is supported by a strongly bonded team that believes in the work we do.
contentBoxesParagraphs: We design, architect and engineer digital products to improve business outcomes, simplify workflows and drive growth.
We transform complex, monolithic legacy applications into modern digital platforms to accelerate business outcomes.
We embed DevSecOps and engineering practices to create developer-facing platforms that accelerate software delivery.
We make high quality data and insights readily available, empowering teams to solve business-critical challenges.

work.title: Customer Stories
work.titleParagraph: Game-changing digital solutions that drive innovation.
subTitles: RENALYTIX: Helping to Eradicate Kidney Disease
TREEDOM: BUILDING VELOCITY, SCALE AND DIGITAL CAPABILITY
paragraphs: Renalytix is on an incredible mission to eradicate kidney disease. We helped to develop a diagnostics data platform that has the potential to stop kidney disease in its tracks.
We worked with Treedom to increase the business’ digital capabilities as well as assist with re-engineering its processes to better cope with high traffic volumes.
“Generally the time to market for any new app is about 30-40% less than it was, which is huge!”
“With NearForm, we found a partner who could help us explore ‘the art of the possible’.”

careers.title: Careers
values: We’re Bold We’re Flexible We’re Open We’re Empowering
nfSayParagraphs: We work hand-in-hand with customers to avoid the common customer-vendor relationship problems.
NearForm really helps employees at every level, we really feel cared about.
faqQuestions: Do you keep past candidates' applications for future openings?
I saw a role recently but can't find it anymore, can I still apply?
I'm a recruiter, can we work together?
faqAnswers: We work remotely with our main HQ based in Tramore, the south of Ireland. Each job description will say where the role is usually based, though we’re big fans of flexible working!

It’s best to keep your eye on our jobs board and submit a new application for any roles which you’re interested in. Our system logs all the applications we get, so we can keep candidates in mind for other roles if they stand out.

We don’t accept email applications. If there’s a role which interests you please submit an application via the relevant job description above. If there aren’t any roles which are the right fit at the moment, please follow our social profiles to keep up to date with new roles.

If a role isn’t on our website it means we’re not accepting applications for the position anymore. We process applications on a rolling basis and encourage everyone to apply as soon as they can. We’re growing super fast though, so sign up for our email updates to be the first to hear about new roles at NearForm.
We’re not looking for any recruitment support right now. We’ve got a big enough team to hire most of the roles we need. But we’ll let you know if that changes!
